news.content: Received Graduate Merit Scholarship (Awarded to top incoming graduate students) from Korea University.
Received Grand Prize (1st Place) in Capstone Design Project at SEOULTECH.
Presented research at SPARK 9th Poster Session â€” received Best Poster 2nd Prize.

gallery.description: Presented research on two topics at the SPARK 9th Poster Session. Engaged in interdisciplinary discussions with participants from diverse backgrounds.
Received Grand Prize (1st Place) in Capstone Design Project at SEOULTECH.
Started research internship at Korea Institute of Science and Technology (KIST).
